# init(for:)

**Initializer**

Creates a model container to use with a Core ML request.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(for model: MLModel) throws
```

## Parameters

- **model**: The model to create the model container from.

## Discussion

This method may fail if the framework doesn’t support the Core ML model. For example, a model that doesn’t accept an image as any of its inputs will yield an [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNErrorCode/invalidModel] error.
